definitions.definition: If you are busy, you are working hard, or giving your attention to a particular thing:
examples: Mum was busy in the kitchen.

definitions.definition: A busy place is full of activity or people:
In a busy period, you have a lot of things to do:
examples: I have a busy week ahead of me.

definitions.definition: If a phone line is busy, someone is using it:
examples: I tried calling you but the line was busy.
